title: Chrome adding ‘Side search’ panel to make it easier to browse results from Google & more [Updated]
content:
Performing a Google search has become an everyday occurrence for most of us, and now Chrome is working to make it easier to browse your results with a new “Side search” panel.

Update: Google is continuing to expand Chrome’s “Side search” feature by supporting more devices and search engines.

more…

The post Chrome adding ‘Side search’ panel to make it easier to browse results from Google & more [Updated] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Chrome is working to make it easier to browse your Google Search results with a new "Side search" panel, coming later this year.
